docs.lead_paragraph: OF the host of books on the Middle Kingdom in this year of grace, Prof. Ross's volume, "The Changing Chinese,"* is in the vanguard. In many respects it is unique. The author is an economist and sociologist, well equipped for his work by research, observation, and scholarship.

headline.main: FOR SICK CHINA, A PRESCRIPTION; Slacken Multiplication, Postpone Marriage, Elevate Women, Drop Ancestor Worship
